artist: Maker: Unknown; Publisher: Schiz-Flux , Madison, Wisc.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, text and subtitle that reads "post-leftist pleasure politics," above an illustration of a woodcut image featuring abstract figures, and another illutsration, transposed before and to the right of the other, of a church steple with a beetle on top, a crow or raven on the pediment of the facade and a man imprisoned in a wooden stock in the foreground, with text and title along the top; 32 pp.
title: Smile #4: Smirk
